content.detailedDescription:
my friend ron and i, were collecting money from his paper route.  it was summer time, after sundown and i believe it was the year before i started high school, which would make it 1975.  we had parked our bikes at a bridge (privately owned walk over bridge) that crosses a creek seperating two front yards on maple road in flint, michigan.  we had stopped there to smoke a cigarette.  there was a thick tree line at the rear of the back yards and a very large field with numerous stands of trees beyond that. we were on the south side of maple road about a quarter mile west of fenton road, looking in a southerly direction.  we had both noticed a very bright light that resembled a star in the sky but we could tell it wasn't a star because it was clearly not that high up in the sky.  no physical shape could be seen, just a very bright light.  within a minute or two of spotting the light and questioning each other what it could be, the light intensified dramatically.  it was not like an artificial light (spotlight or such) but radiating.  there was no sound at all.  we were wondering what it might be but discounted helicopter or plane as there was no noise.  it had started to decend on about a 45 degree angle towards the west very slowly and stopped in a short distance, perhaps 50 to 100 yards.  it stopped for a few seconds and then decended at an angle toward the east for about the same distance.  again it stopped momentarily.  it then decended straight downward slowly.  it went downward to the point that we could no longer see the light directly but could see the huge glow radiating over the height of the trees in the back yards.  we could tell it was within a mile, between maple road and hill road which runs east and west and between fenton road and van slyke road, both running north and south.  we were excited.  no sooner did one of us say something to the effect of "i wonder if it is landing in the field?", when the object shot upward at an angle towards the east and into space as far as our eyes could see, beyond the stars.  it was gone in less than a 2 seconds.  it gave me goose bumps.  my friend ron said, "i'd like to take a ride on that!"  i told him it gave me the willies and i was ready to get the hell out of there.  we finished collecting and i don't recall if we had ever spoke of it afterward.
   i was thinking about it a few years ago after watching a show on tv where a navy commander and several others had witnessed a very bright light during military excercises at sea.  (i don't remember when the show aired or the details)  i only know that the way the commander explained their sighting, it was as if they had seen exactly the same type of light ron and i saw.  it prompted me to call ron, who lives in florida now.  i told ron i wanted to tell him what i remembered and see if it was what he remembered.  he verified that the story pretty much summed it up.
content.summary: A very bright object that decended slowly at an angle then shot into space in an instant.

content.detailedDescription: Tuesday, feb. 6th, 2008:  i first noticed bright flashes in the night sky about a mile after getting on to fm 813 traveling from waxahachie to palmer, a 9 mile stretch of fairly winding road.  at first i thought they came from a nearby tower to warn aircraft, but then realized that they were both higher, brighter and moved across the sky in a rhythmic pattern in a 1-one-thousand, 2-one-thousand, 3-one-thousand time frame.  the flashes tended to stay at the same asimuth, about 40-45 degrees up.  flash one was the brightest at 3 o'clock then slightly not as bright at 12 o'clock then less bright at about 9 o'clock.  as i traveled these became more eratic and less rhythmic.  about 3 miles outside of palmer, i caught one flash that bounced right to my left as i looked out the window and my eyes caught an entire rainbow of color.  this was the last flash.  i saw no more that night.  i got home shortly after 10 pm so this happened between 9:30 and 9:50 pm.  i am a scientist, so therefore the flashes were a curiosity to me.
content.summary: Flashes in sky on way home along country road 878

content.detailedDescription: I was driving headed south down la brea in medium traffic.  out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright moving light, i though it was some type of comet or star or something, but once i looked i realized that it was not.  i looked up, and was shocked to see a moving orb/sphere followed by a bright green comet like tail, but much larger (same shape that a comet tail would be).  the color of the green tail was very similar to a green light on a stop light, but was darker at the edges and lighter in the center.   the orb/sphere moved across the sky from east to west very quickly, followed by the comet like tail, and then stopped, and took off up (or out of the atmosphere), and everything dissapeared all at once, the comet like tail was there until the orb moved out of the atmosphere.  at first i though the orb was just shrinking in size, but then realized it was moving up - giving an apperance of shrinking in size because it was moving away.  i watched it until it was what appeared to be out of the atmosphere, and the orb and tail had both dissapeared at the same time.  i was very excited after seeing it, and realizing it was a ufo, and called my dad, who told me he had seen something just like what i had described about a week earlier.  very exciting, it was my second sighiting, but my first was not nearly as bright, or destinct.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A sphere/circle shaped object followed by a bright green comet like tail

content.detailedDescription: To see the video, simply go to google.Com, and search "the 1/20/ ufo tape". first one is it.
content.summary: In regards to a previous ufo entered in this database, i give to you the corrisponding video to the entry on 1/20/ 08 "corner of himes and columbus".

content.detailedDescription: As we were in our gym at the apartments we live at it was a sunny clear day out i was looking outside of the window when i saw a bright shining silver oblong shape thing in the sky it was just sitting there in the air as i watch it it started to move slowly across the sky very slow i thought it was a plane but the it when very fast and disappeared out of sight. it has shapes to the structure. i can draw it and send it to you in a few days.
content.summary: Saw in out a window of our gym

content.detailedDescription:
i'm a 59 year old engineer who has had nuclear regulatory commission clearances to work on and operate nuclear reactors in the u.S.
  in august of 1970 my friend tom & i spent a few weeks vacationing. days surfing and nights at a camp ground 12 miles due west of ocean city, n.J. 
  slightly after midnight, with a very clear sky, we sat outside our tent. a line of large, prop-driven, military cargo planes were passing directly overhead going to the north-east. they flew so low their engine's noise prevented any conversation. with the vietnam war at its height, these flights were common along the coast.
  we heard the 1st plane coming minutes before it was directly overhead and the noise was intense until it moved on. the 2nd plane, which appeared to be a mile behind the 1st was no different. as it passed over and onward there was a flying disc shaped craft directly behind it by about 1/2 mile. 
   the disc was as wide as the plane's wings, tip to tip. it didn't wobble, made no sound, and flew in the formation at what appeared to be the same speed as the other planes.  it had a few solid red lights on each edge as if marking the four points of a compass. as it glided off, following the 2nd plane, we saw that its middle was as thick as the cargo plane and tapered toward the edges. no leading edge could be seen nor could we see any markings or windows.  
   in disbelief we were questioning each other as to what we were seeing when our speech was soon overwelmed by the noise of the 3rd cargo plane now passing overhead. adding to our shock was the sight of another identical disc shaped craft tailing 1/2 mile behind it. 
   no more disc were seen as the remaining planes, perhaps six in all, continued out of site. 
   i've kept this sighting to myself and a few trusted friends for alot of years. i haven't seen any u.F.O.'s since nor has tom.
content.summary: Two disks flying within a formation of military planes.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see objects in sky at the time i took these photos. i was in stone ridge, ny on may 22, 2007, roughly around 10 am. 

while i was waiting for a fellow landscape design crew to show up at our clients home, i felt like i was being watched. i didn't think much of it at the time because the location i was at was a weekend home for this particular client, and the neighbors (whom i assumed where home due to multiple cars in the shared drive) might not have recognized my vehicle.

when the crew showed (approximately 10:20 am) we proceeded to walk the front yard (as noted in these pictures) i was taking the photos for reference for future landscape plans myself, the other team and the clients had. 

when i downloaded the pictures i noticed that there were strange objects in the sky. the two photos i have sent are taken one right after the other just moving slightly right of the first. the first photo shows three objects one very close and then getting progressively further away, in a perfect triangle formation. the second image (taken immediately after the second just to the right of the first) shows a saucer.

stone ridge is near the shawangunks, as i believe you can see the ridge rising in the images to the left. the clients live just on the border of stone ridge and high falls. beyond this area perhaps 10 miles is accord, ny.
content.summary: Feeling as if i was being watched

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:10 pm i was leaving work, walking out to my car. it was an exceptionally clear day. my office is located about 4 miles north-west of dulles airport and as i walked out to my car i always look at the planes flying over head. i turned back towards the office (i was facing east) and saw a plane flying east away from me. i would say the plane was about 5000 feet up and app. 45 degrees from the horizon.

trailing behind the plane was an object. the object was approximately one-third the size of the plane, and following a plane's length behind. the plane might have been a 747 (i think i recall four engines, but on this i am not entirely certain.)

the object, which i first mistook for a puff of cloud, followed the planes' heading and velocity. after the half second of thinking it was a cloud, i then thought it was a fighter jet closely tailing the larger plane. my thought after that was, "no, no fighter jet would trail a commercial jetliner that closely. is the plane dragging something?"

i then concentrated on the object, cause at this point i was really puzzled. this needs some set-up. the sun was setting behind me, so the jet that the object was following was lit rather bright from beneath. i could detect no markings or detail on the plane, but it was essentially a large, washed-out white jet shape. the object that was following it was darkish grey in the middle going towards lighter grey at the outside, almost like a cloud. and like a cloud, i believe that the object had indistinct edges. i am doubting myself on this point cause it seems a bit wacky, but i could not really discern a distinct shape to the object...

the object followed the jet perfectly the entire 15-20 seconds it was in view. the object did not fall behind, or change its position, behind and slightly to the right of the plane.

i grabbed my cell phone, opened it, and snapped a picture. i should have taken my time, cause i only got clear blue sky. (yes, i am hating myself right now.)

there was a slight shading difference in the center of the object, so it was not a perfect oval or sphere or disk. it seemed to have a hard edge or seam down the middle.

the jet started to bank to the north, "evasive maneuvers" i thought, "the plane knows its being tracked." and then, i lost the plane and the object behind the roof of my office building. i then ran backwards towards my car, to try and track the plane and object a little further, but i could not get them back into view.

as i said before, this was literally right above dulles international airport. the air traffic in the area is extremely heavy. i cannot believe that someone else did not witness this event, either from the control tower, from other planes in the air or from elsewhere on the ground.
content.summary: Object trailing large jet above dulles airport

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of the event 2 friends and i were out fishing on the red river in the area due east of wichita falls, tx. just north of hiway 79. at around 10 pm (it was totally dark)we were just sitting around the campfire enjoying the evening when one of us, and im not sure if it were me or one of my friends noticed a star like object, just a little bit brighter than the majority of the stars, say about the brightness of venus moving along like a satellite. we made the comment about the satellite overhead. as we were watching the object it slowed to a complete stop. it appeared to us that the object was at about the altitude of a jetliner but was very hard to tell.  anyway as we watched the thing, as i said earlier it made a complete stop. then proceded on after the intitial stop. the object did this three times, and in the process formed a triangle trajectory. in essence the object traveled a straight line, stopped, formed the second border of the triangle then stopped say for 30 seconds at each corner, then completed the triangular trajectory, which was straight overhead.The area covered was probably about the size of a basketball if outstretched at arms length. it did this complete manuever twice, then proceeded in a northwesterly direction at a fairly slow rate of speed ,10 minutes or so until in went out of site to the northwest horizon. there was absolutely no noise associated with this object doing whatever it was doing. we all were fairly shaken up by this because we did not think a satellite could manuever in this manner and that there was abslutely no noise associated. we decided to pack up and leave the river that evening.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object maneuvering

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning home from knoxville sometime around midnight. we were living out in the country on top of a knoll surrounded by cleared open pasture land. the night dark and overcast but not raining and no stars were visible.

as we exited the car and started walking to the house something caused me to look up. i then spotted the lights on a vehicle passing directly above us. these strobe lights were in a ���v��� configuration that began at the lead point and traveled down the leading edge of both wings simultaneously.

 the object was quite large or quite low as it took up a large section of the sky above us but we were not able to accurately judge this due to the weather conditions that night that did not provide any stars behind it to outline the size and shape of it nor were there any ground lights to illuminate it.

as we watched, this object made a slow turn to the south towards knoxville and moved out of sight. at no time did we hear any noise from this object or any other lights. 

i have wondered about this for years now and have tried to debunk the experience as being a plane or a balloon but as yet can not. this object when spotted was traveling in an east to westerly direction and performed a slow 90 degree bank to the south.  it was moving at speed that would cause a commercial aircraft to stall and too large to be completely silent. we would have at least heard the air flowing across the wings and/or control surfaces. if it had been a balloon then we would have heard the engine as it moved southward.
content.summary: A silent slow moving "v" shaped object with strobes along leading edge of wings

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of december 10,2005 at approximately 10:30p.M i was outside of my house in my driveway stargazing facing due north with a pair of 10x50 binoculars i observed a small star like object in appearance appear on my apparent horizon climb vertically at a very high rate of speed(no exhaust trail of any kind).The object's color was white,not blinking or flashing or giving of a coronna of any kind.The object was about as bright as venus.As the object climbed higher it accelerated more than it was when i first observed it,at about a 70%angle in relation to me i noticed a second object,identical to the first in every charactoristic follow the same path and trjectory of the first.Both objects were far away because they initiated from my apparent horizon.The first object sped up much faster at this point,faster than anyjet i ever saw and continued to accellerate skyward straight up from the 70% angle it was before and then the was a bright flash and my first impression was that it went into earth orbit because it turned n,ne and continued in that direction eventually heading east(from my 12 oclock to my 3 oclock position in an arc.The incredible thing about this was the objects speed after the flash,i observed one of the space shuttles in orbit a few years before and this object was travelling at least three times the observed orbital speed of the space shuttle i had observed before,putting this object's velocity in the 50,000mph range.At this point the second object
had made the same (flash)and followed the exact arc and direction of travel that the first one did.About 3 minutes had passed from my first observation and the first object appeared to stop accelerate at a recipracle direction towards the ne,n then appeared to enter the atmosphere again and travel back down below the horizon from where i had first viewed it and disapeared out of sight.The second object had passed the first one heading back at the same high rate of speed then reversed course like the first one and headed back in the same reciprical heading but unlike the first object that came back down the second object appeared to stop in space and instantly became very dim and just dissapeared,my impression was that it shot out to deep space, unlike the first object.I do not believe that these object were man made.
content.summary: On the aproximate date above i observed two star like objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten up, i walked to look out a window to see how much snow we had gotten the night before. i noticed a red light low in the sky behind a tree line. as soon as i registed that i was seeing something very different it took off at a diagonal in about 1 1/2 sec. up and out of sight. i looked around the room for anything that could have caused a reflection, the alarm clock had red lights, but there is no way it was the cause. i think back and i know i could see the glow through the trees. whatever i saw i know it was not comming from inside reflecting. i'm not saying it was a space ship, but it was something! i've seen many meteor showers and never saw one go from that low up.
content.summary: Out a window i saw a red light travel quickly from low to high and gone.

content.detailedDescription:
From app. 10:00pm, 2/07, until 6:15am, 2/08, we witnessed many unusual and fantastic objects above austin, texas. i managed to capture almost three minutes of video of one of the vehicles and though it is excellent quality it doesn't represent the machine accurately. in fact, all the objects were better seen with the naked eye than with magnification.

we saw at least four different machines: cylinders, triangles, rectangles and saucers though the rectangular ships could have also been triangular. their lights were stunning -- often brilliant -- with a purity of color that's difficult to describe.

i will post more information soon but i would ike to reitterate that this was an extraordinary event and i would be surprised if many, many people did not see what we saw. for those of you who were not fortunate enough to see these amazing objects for yourselves, i have video and i will post it asap.
content.shape: Cigar,  Cone,  Cylinder,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Triangle
content.summary: Ufo's over austin

content.detailedDescription: Traveling on brownsville rd. west coming toward the t intersection of bernville/robesonia road just north of robesonia.  i saw a glowing fireball in the horizon roughly over the town of myerstown.  the light would stay glowing in the same spot for 5-10 seconds then immediately go out and another glow would appear just to the right of the previous glowing object.  the distance apart from the glowing object would be roughly the with of your thumb if you extended your arm toward the objects.  there were a total of 4 glowing objects that appeared.  they did not appear at the same time, but in the a sequence moving right.  when one would go out, another would appear to the right and stay lit and pulsating for 5-10 seconds.  this same sequence of glowing lights were witnessed by my brother, dad, and i almost 11 years ago feb 20th 1997.  we lived in richland pa and saw the same type of light sequence over the town of myerstown.  my brother got a look at it with binoculars and could see tiny white sparkles circling the glowing objects.  the feb 20th light sequence lasted much longer, around 30 mins and ended with the orange glowing streaking off and disapearing.
content.summary: 4 orange glowing objects over the western horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Seen white lights then orange balls that would glow then fade away. i think they are some kind of military flares. lots of air traffic in area that we usually dont have flying. sounds just like what the man from texas seen from his rig on galvan road. this same thing was reported seen on jan. 30 by two people article in local newspaper.    

email tlt@centex.Net
content.summary: White lights then orange circles much like the one mentioned on galvan rd

content.detailedDescription: On february 7th 2008, at approximately 6:55 pm, just after finishing dinner. i suddenly got a strange feeling of being watched, my dog heidi was whining to go out.  as soon as i let her out she began barking, and throwing a fit. i looked out though the sliding door out the backyard to see what the deal was. i saw a huge, extremely bright (blinding), star like object in the sky above the neighbors roof (not directly above) about a mile away towards the north.  it stayed there from 6:55pm to 6:59pm.  then it moved towards the east at amazing speed.  all you could see was bright white light. it would stop moving, and then start again, in totally odd angles. then the object just disappeared.  at this point i was excited about whatever it was. with my recent excitement, my younger brother (age 14) came out to see too.  what we saw next was many helicopters (quick ones) or planes (moved like helicopters); from the direction of buckley air force base.  there were 2 to start with (7:03). these helicopters began to circle the area; we went from backyard to front yard to see them. the star like object appeared dead stopped (same spot again) at 7:08. it then took off exactly the same way at 7:12. at this point you could hear the circling helicopters; there were about 6 of them (not sure).  we watched them, back to front yard from 7:12 to 7:18.  then one more time we observed the star like object dead stopped (same spot again) 7:19 to 7:25.  this time however, a spotlight moved back and forth towards or from the object and the ground about a 1 mile distance from each other (north to northwest). my mother also observed this from the kitchen window. it then took off in the same manor, and then disappeared.  after these events we continued to watch and counted a total of 10 helicopters circling the area from 7:26 to 7:40. i also observed many dogs barking in the neighborhood and heard sirens. the whole event was very strange, but exciting.  i���ve never seen anything like this!
content.summary: Extremely bright, star like, white light, large

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were coming home from skateland. as we were aproaching our home i looked up into the sky to see how many stars were out when i noticed a dark triangle object fly across the sky. i only saw it because of the street lights reflecting off the bottom of it. this object had no lights and no sound with it. i just got a new telescope so i have been looking at the stars a lot lately. luckily i have seen more than stars. this is the second sighting for me here in tulsa, ok. last year about this time i was driving and saw a bright light in the sky it stayed in the sky above my car for a few minutes and then took off at an impossible speed and vanished into a tiny dot. it was like watching star trek do warp speed. i never thought i would get to see another one. my son was really excited he looked out the window for a while afterwards. it was definately a thrilling experience. the object would have been to dark for a picture or video to capture i think.
content.summary: Dark triangle object flew across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east of porter,ohio(southeastern ohio) on state route 554 at approximately 230-300pm on sunday,3rd of feb. it was a cloudy day and sun hitting clouds directly in front of me and something caught my eye(like a movement different from the clouds) to where i slowed and tried to see it better. the clouds were low and colored from light to dark and i seen a blue blimp looking craft,not extremely high altitude it seemed. it seemed to be big,like a blimp and moved at a fairly good speed right amongst the clouds going from west to east in a straight line. i had a car behind me ,so i had to look at the road and drive,but it did not really fit,that it moved steady and at a good speed,but was not like a plane and was right in the rain clouds. i must admit,i just couldn't make a definite identification that quick,but as a few days went by,it just keeps sticking in my mind that it was out of place compared to anything i ever seen. it was light blue,but as it went in front of darker clouds ,it stood out from the background. i was just curious if any reports by others from my area have been reported.
content.summary: Driving east on st.Rt. 554,seen blue blimp shaped object in clouds moving west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my pick nick table watching the sky to the south from my home looking for satelites when i saw what i thought was a satelite coming from the south heading north it was bright orange in color.  i was expecting it to come straight overhead when it just stopped in the sky at about 45% from where i was sitting it was the brightest thing in the sky.
 i ran into the house got my wife and had her come outside and sit with me just to watch it for a bit.  as we were sitting there the object moved at a right angle from which it had come from for quite a distance towards the east it then slowed down and made a wobbly circle and stopped i asked my wife what she thought it was she said she didn't know and went in the house it was cold out.
  as i sat there watching it i saw a flash farther away than this object like a flash from a jet fighter and that flash took off towards the north now my curiosity was going i tried to watch the orange object with binoculars and a telescope but it looked the same as with my eye.
  as i watched the object for a bit it started moving towards the west and then it started moving away from me and then just disapeared in the sky.  i then just sat there looking with my binoculars at where i had seen the flash in the sky to the east i was watching a star configuration that the flash had appeared near when all of a sudden i saw another flash and with the binoculars i could see some thing take off very fast in the same direction as the first flash and that was it.
 i have never seen any thing like that again
content.summary: Three objects in the night sky one october evening

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down 422 west after work in greenhills pa. left work at 0230est am was about to get off west reading exit when i looked up and saw a bluish white ball of light moving very fast was only in sky maybe 5 seconds did not have a tail so dont believe it was a comet. i was not looking up but it was so bright it caught my eye.And i lost it behind the mountain.Origanaly i thought maybe it was the sattelite coming down but heard that was still in orbit.
content.summary: Bright bluish white ball of light no tail

content.detailedDescription: It was 6:55pm est, and i had just exited my house to go on an errand.  i live in a court that has 5 houses in it, and i park my car on the outside edge of the court.  as i was walking towards my car, i saw a bright star like object in the sw sky.  it was the brightest thing i have ever seen in the sky.  it was about 3-5 times brighter than anything i've ever seen in the sky, including a star or venus.  i starred at it for approximately 5 seconds, before if faded out of my vision.  it was not an airplane, a helicopter, a planet or star.  i am almost certain it was not the international space station passing through the sky, as i have seen that in the sky three times, and the object i saw on the evening of 2/7 was much brighter than that, and it did not move through space like the space station does.  i was totally amazed about what i've seen tonight.  at first i thought that it might have been a star having a supernova, in fact i am pretty sure thats what it could have been.  but since it was unidentified, i figured i'd share my story with your organization.
content.summary: Saw a bright light in the sw sky for approx 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my daughters front porch to have a cigarette and sat down.  i noticed a light behind a tree across the street and at first thought it was a street light behind the tree opening. i stared at it because it seemed to blink and move very, very slowly but then seemed to stand still again. i couldn't decide at first whether it was moving or just blinking.Then after watching it hover still in the sky it slowly began to move into sight and i opened the door and yelled into my daughter to come out and said, what are those lights?  she looked up into the sky and said "mom, that's a plane" and i said "no, and laughed and said "look at how damn big it is, does that look like a plane?" then as it flew slowly overhead she could see what i was talking about and it was huge! there was about 3-4 lights, white, in the front, and red and orange lights in the back with a flat greyish middle. it is hard to discribe, but it was rectangular in shape and flat on the bottom and if it were compared in size would have to be atleast two football size long.  very odd!  she had then ran back inside to grab her glasses when she could see it was very obviously not a plane.  but it was gone by the time she got out back in front of the house.  we couldn't believe what we had just seen. i asked her what it sounded like to her and how she would discribe it.  she says a "hmmmmmmmmmm" sound and i say a very low deep rumble sound.  this is very strange! we lost sight of the object when it flew overhead of us and out back behind her home into the sky.
content.summary: Object hovered in back of trees line still, then afer appx 3 min flew very slowly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
This was the last day of the bob hope chrysler classic in the coachella valley. my friend and i were playing golf down the road in indio at landmark golf club (now called terra lago).  we were playing the north course. we had hit our tee shots and were waiting for the group ahead to finish so we could go for the green.  i was in the fairway and my friend was off to the right about 30yds.

i am a licensed private pilot as well as being a surgeon who is interested in the constellations and i'm always looking for things in the sky.  i know what routes commercial planes take out of la toward julian vor etc.  i know what a satellite looks like and the path they usually take.  while waiting i just looked up and there it was, i just looked right at it.  near as i could tell it looked spherical, it was light gray in color and it appeared judging from passing planes to be well above the 32plus thousand feet the commercial planes were at.  it had to be about 50-60 thousand or higher.  it appeared stationary and i watched it for about one minute and it did not appear to move.  it was a little north of me in direction.  then it did move at acute angles 45 degrees, 90 degrees etc, and i watched it for a few seconds doing that.  as soon as i saw it i knew it was a ufo.  

i then called my friend over so he could verify i wasn't seeing things.  he saw it right away after i pointed it out.  together we saw it for another three minutes or so and we verified to each other its movements.  we hit up on the green and i tried again to find it but could not.

now one of the only things it could have been i suppose is a weather balloon.  at that altitude the wind could have appeared to move it acutely.  however,i am not aware of any regular weather balloon launches here in the valley.  i discount this because of the angles it took and because it was such a clear day what a waste a balloon would have been.  sorry i don't have any photos.  i was at 29 palms marine air ground combat center for four years as a civilian physician and during that time was not aware of regular weather balloon launching.  also, as you are aware, nellis air force base is just north of vegas as is area 51.  at the height it was you could probably see that far without difficulty.

this was really cool and i just wanted them to know that if it wasn't a balloon than someone saw the technology because there are those of us who look up and who understand what certain things look like and that they just can't hide it forever.  i would be disappointed if it was a balloon.
content.summary: A circle or sphere very high in the air probably 50-60 thousand feet, hovering then moving a sharp angles

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and saw a red light the size of a pin head shoot off in the blink of an eye. in it's place appeared a blinking stobe light the size of about 3 pin heads. the stobe then split into 2 red lights and separated about 3 fingers wide then disappeared. it all took place to the south west. i reported other sightings about a week ago.
content.summary: Blinking object turned into 2 red lights and separated

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my roof top and i saw about 7 stars going around in a circular motion and i just watched for about 15 minuets and they stopped and at the last minuet i thought "if they see us we see them" and they all jsut dissapeared
content.summary: Appeared dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my front porch watching a small group of sandhill cranes flying directly overhead of me (azimuth +90 degrees) while facing due south when a small object, a bright white dot about the size of a ballpoint pen's head at arms length, came into my view traveling from the northeast towards the southeast. my immediate thought was that this was a satelite but as i watched it pass overhead the object's course began to slightly curve to the west-southwest. the object was moving at a very high rate of speed, taking about 4 seconds to travel from exactly overhead to an azimuth of about +40 degrees when i lost sight of it behind a tree. there was no contrail produced by the object, nor was there any sound. about 2 seconds into its passage the direction changed slightly but was noticeable (making an estimate, if the original course was 225 degrees it would be heading about 240 when i lost sight of it).

i have watched multiple planes fly over since, all leave a very obvious contrails. also, i have counted how long it takes for a plane to cover the apporximate distance that i saw the object travel and have averaged about 45 seconds. i have had time to walk from my front porch to my truck, about 20 feet total, open a locked door, take my binoculars out and sight in on the aircraft and verify that it is a airliner in that time span. 

i knew the moment that i saw this object it was not a military aircraft, i have seen in flight the following: f-106, f-4, f-5/t-38, f-15, f-16, f-14, f/a-18, and am reasonably sure i saw an f-22. as an avid bird watcher with over 225 positive species i have seen high flying birds visable only with binoculars, these are clearly identifiable as birds you just can't tell the species. i am also a backyard astronomy buff and have seen satelites/space station/space shuttle pass overhead when they are visable but in all cases these have originated in the west side of the compass and headed in a straight line to the east, the ne to se course is what really made me wonder what i was seeing. the very high rate of speed was the second thing that confused me, the only things i have seen travel that fast are meteors but again there was no contrail and i have never seen a meteor travel essentially half way across the visable sky or change direction.
content.summary: Observed object moving from ne to se in curving track at very high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: this was around the time that a person called mr nobody was picked up in toronto with amnesia...He was transferred to the hospital at which i was already in ....2 other people and myself were all taken ...I wasnt going to say anything but the one whom everyone referred to as mr nobody seemed to reconize me and pointed me out to the doctors .I remember the majority of the trip and still to this day would like to remember the rest....It was quite the vessel that i was in..Actually quite amazing.They the little guys about 3-4 feet high long gangly arms that hang about 10 inches off of the ground upside garlic head with two big black eyes (i didnt see any nose or mouth, but they can communicate.Came and got me from my room.This is not my first encounter...But it is the one that i remember the most and alot about the vessel...It is something that i at this time dont just want to write about but this is a wild story and i want a reply before i go any further...I even got some pictures of another time roughly may 2003 (?) i call it 3 eclipses in one week  i have about 60 70 pictures thru out the day . that event took place in abbotsford /mission  b.C area
content.summary: 3 people where taken from the hospital,i was one

content.detailedDescription:
As i type this, i do not have an exact date and time, as the event occurred in 1976. i list it as 19 august 1976 at approximately 10 pm because i remember the moon phase (full) and the approximate position in the sky. it was either a friday or saturday evening.

i was 11 years old, about to turn 12. my eyeglass prescription had recently been renewed, so my eyesight was excellent. at the time, i was an aviation enthusiast. even at age 11, i would consider myself a competent observer. we lived near the flight path of hartsfield-atlanta airport, so i was exposed to many different viewings of civilian aircraft both in day and night conditions.

the sky was fully dark, except for the full moon over the southwestern horizon. there were no clouds. my grandmother and i were sitting on her porch at their home in lovejoy, georgia (south of atlanta). we were just talking about things in general, and watching light aircraft from a local airport, the now-demolished south expressway airport, travel on a standard flightpath from north to south (i always presumed from the atlanta airspace to the macon-warner robbins air hubs). as the aircraft flew past, they were close enough that we could hear their reciprocating engines and easily spot their headlights and navigation lights. the flight path would have been between the i-75 and us hwy 41 corridors as they moved south from the greater atlanta, ga area.

after viewing the civilian traffic for a while, i spotted the object i am reporting emerge from behind the roof of my grandmother's abode. it was a solid, white, luminescent oval. it was not a reflection of moonlight or other light source. i immediately noted that it was a solid light, not a combination of lights as would be expected from a normal light aircraft. i also noticed that the object emitted no discernible sound.

the ufo was following the same flight path as the civilian aircraft we had been observing, and it was traveling at the same speed (possibly trying to be inconspicuous?).

i remember pointing at it and saying, "granny, that's a ufo." it was obvious that it wasn't anything i had ever seen before. a moment after i pointed the object out, it proceeded to defy the known laws of physics. from my perspective, it seemed to vanish, and then instantaneously reappear about 3 degrees above and to the south of its previous position. it then immediately vanished again and reappeared on the same flight path and maintained its previous speed (i have always assumed that it was just moving so fast that my eyes could not catch it as it "zig-zagged", and i only saw it at one point in it's "jump"). needless to say, my young heart jumped when i saw the maneuver. i asked my grandmother if she saw it do that, and she replied that she had, so i knew it wasn't just a trick of my own eyes.

as the ufo continued on its course, it was about to pass behind a cedar tree that was planted in my grandmother's front yard. i told her to keep an eye on it, and i jumped off the porch. i lost sight of the object as it moved behind the tree. i circled around the north side of the tree, but when i reached the other side, the ufo was gone. i asked my grandmother if she saw what happened, and she said that the ufo had emerged from behind the tree, and then suddenly shot off like a tracer bullet (she pointed in the direction of the full moon).

throughout the encounter, there was no sound whatsoever. notably, throughout sub-sonic to apparent super-(perhaps hyper-)sonic maneuvers, there was no sonic boom.

conclusions/important facts/observations:

- whatever the object was, it was able to instaneously accelerate to absurd speeds and decelerate/change course with no noticible necessity to obey newtonian laws concerning inertia.
- it was luminescent, and a constant brightness. the outline (oval, as pharmaceutical-capsule-shaped) of the object was clear and sharp.
- it made no discernible noise whatever (there was a housecat sitting on the bench with us, and it had no reaction whatever to the ufo).
- it was following a civilian aircraft flight path (as a side note, where the flight path passed over there is today a county jail. this is how i calculated the approximate distance).
- when my grandmother and i, ground-based observers, spotted it and reacted to its presence, it reacted as well (no way of knowing if there was a causal relationship there, could just be coincidence).
- distance would have been probably about 2000 feet (less than a mile, but more than 1000 feet based on the size of the civilian aircraft we were previously observing).
- the ufo was about the same size as a civilian, single-engined light aircraft.
- my grandmother, the co-witness, has since passed on.

thank you for giving us the venue to post this event for others to compare similarities. my perspective on the universe and our place in it has never been the same since this event.
content.summary: August 1976 - ufo following civil aviation flightpath/performing instananeous acceleration/deceleration.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends where out in the feild and we went to the futer and saw what it would be like in the futer if we did not help them with the anus alians and we said that we would help them. they asked us if we had any alienistic wepons and we said hell no and then we went to war with the aliean anuses because we where in the futer and we had no idea that this was going to hapen.
content.shape: Blimp,  Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cone,  Chevron,  Circle,  Cross,  Cylinder,  Diamond,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: A shape shifting flying object

content.detailedDescription: It started when the sun went down and the stars come out. a black cloud formed over it and a light shot out 3 more lights also it formed into a triangle and smashed togehter aand dissappeared. then later that night more started to come out of it my mother and i were sitting in the living room for about 2 hours watchng them lights dance back in forth up and down. after a couple minutes of watching it we called up some people to see if they were seeing the same stuff as we were they were seeing the same thing to. my reation to it was wow w.T.H is that it kind of scared me at first because i didn't know what it was and what its doing. later that night around 11:00p.M i was getting tired of watching them so i went to bed. but when i got up at ^:30 for school they were still out in the sky
content.summary: Looks like a star but when you zoom in its dances and moves from side to side then it forms into a cross like figure
